title: Flying careers with the Navy
brief_description: Illustrates aspects of the training of pilots for the Royal Australian Navy, showing how recruits gain experience handling Tiger Moth, Wirraway, Sea Fury and Fire-Fly types of aircraft. The film records joint Navy and Air Force exercises held off the NSW coast to test Australian defences against possible attack from sea and air.
